nodes.text: The Ministry of Technology was the headquarters of the Devisors, the ruling caste of the planet Exocron. It was a tall, castle-like structure, with towers connected by ramparts. It contained an observatory that the Devisors could use to study astronomy. The Ministry was a stronghold, and guarded by watchtowers and roving patrols.

Inside, the Ministry contained thousands of data-tapes and records concerning spaceflight and navigation, taken from the Exocros Cabal. High-tech weapons and equipment, including Pagda Gevtes' personal walker, were also stored in the building.
In 8 ABY, the Ministry was invaded by New Republic forces intent on rescuing their commanding officer, Captain Kaiya Adrimetrum, who was being held in the structure.
